function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Complex model evaluation may lead to inaccuracies in COVID-19 predictions","Impact":"Inaccurate predictions may result in misinformed decision-making and ineffective disease mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Consult with domain experts and validate the model with real-world data to improve accuracy","Technologies":"ARIMA, statistical software, data visualization tools","People":"Epidemiologists, data scientists, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of vaccination and immunity rates in the model","Impact":"Failure to account for vaccination and immunity rates can lead to overestimation or underestimation of COVID-19 spread and impact","Mitigation":"Incorporate vaccination and immunity rate data into the model and adjust model parameters accordingly","Technologies":"Data modeling software, statistical analysis tools","People":"Epidemiologists, public health researchers","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for behavioral and social factors impacting disease spread","Impact":"Modeling that ignores behavioral and social factors may produce unrealistic predictions and ineffective control measures","Mitigation":"Incorporate social and behavioral data into the model to account for human interactions and adherence to control measures","Technologies":"Social network analysis tools, behavioral data analytics software","People":"Behavioral scientists, public health experts","Owner":"Public health agencies, behavioral research organizations"}]}
